## IReferenceCountedPtr.registerOnFreeListener() method

Callback will be called when the reference count hits 0. Useful for cleanup.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
registerOnFreeListener(callback: () => void): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  callback | () =&gt; void |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
